rootCause: A new multi-line preflight message was added to the traefik-install just recipe using a here-document, but the closing EOF marker was missing in the justfile, leaving the here-doc unterminated when rendered to shell.
resolution: Replaced the faulty here-doc with explicit echo statements and added a pytest that renders the traefik-install recipe with just --show and validates it with bash -n to prevent future syntax regressions.
